name: The Fall of the House of Usher
description: The Fall of the House of Usher is a short starring Herbert Stern, Hildegarde Watson, and Melville Webber. A traveller arrives at the Usher mansion to find that the sibling inhabitants, Roderick and Madeline Usher, are living under a...

name: Master i Margarita
description: Master i Margarita is a movie starring Viktor Rakov, Anastasiya Vertinskaya, and Nikolay Burlyaev. Interwoven are a satire of the 1930's under Stalin, the inner struggle of Pontius Pilate around the execution of Jesus, and the love...

name: Pál Adrienn
description: Pál Adrienn is a movie starring Éva Gábor, István Znamenák, and Ákos Horváth. A lonely obese nurse, working at a hospital terminal ward, is reminded of her childhood friend Adrienn Pal and wants to track her down.

name: Hudutlarin Kanunu
description: Hudutlarin Kanunu is a movie starring Yilmaz Güney, Pervin Par, and Erol Tas. In order to keep his ailing son alive, an impoverished man agrees to sneak a herd of sheep across the border.

name: You Stupid Man
description: You Stupid Man is a movie starring Milla Jovovich, David Krumholtz, and William Baldwin. After a man finally gets over his former girlfriend, who has moved to Los Angeles and become a television star, and falls in love with another...

name: Al-risâlah
description: Al-risâlah is a movie starring Abdallah Gheith, Mona Wassef, and Hamdy Gheith. The story of prophet "Muhammad" and the delivery of the message of God "Allah."

name: Stilleben
description: Stilleben is a movie starring Kaja Silverman. Are today's advertising photographers continuing in the tradition of 17th century Flemish painters? This is one theory director Harun Farocki poses in his documentary STILL LIFE....

name: Le cousin Jules
description: Le cousin Jules is a movie starring Jules Guiteaux, Félicie Guiteaux, and Claude Chaudat. An ode to rural France and the simple joys of life, Dominique Benicheti's glorious masterpiece COUSIN JULES captures the daily routine and...

name: Bob the Butler
description: Bob the Butler is a movie starring Tom Green, Brooke Shields, and Genevieve Buechner. Tom Green stars as a bumbling buffoon, who lands at Butling after working his way through all other 'A' and 'B' jobs.

name: The Cat with Hands
description: The Cat with Hands is a short starring Livy Armstrong, Daniel Hogwood-Kane, and Victoria Hayes. The dark, surreal story of a cat who wants to be human.

name: Too Much Johnson
description: Too Much Johnson is a movie starring Joseph Cotten, Virginia Nicolson, and Edgar Barrier. A woman has two lovers. When one man finds out about the other, he acts as a villain and chases after the protagonist.

name: My Childhood
description: My Childhood is a movie starring Stephen Archibald, Hughie Restorick, and Jean Taylor Smith. The second part (My ain folk) of Bill Douglas' influential trilogy harks back to his impoverished upbringing in early-'40s Scotland. Cinema...

name: My Ain Folk
description: My Ain Folk is a movie starring Stephen Archibald, Hughie Restorick, and Jean Taylor Smith. Jamie and Tommy are separated by the death of their grandmother; Jamie with another relative and Tommy to a welfare home. Now Jamie is all...

name: Cockfighter
description: Cockfighter is a movie starring Warren Oates, Richard B. Shull, and Harry Dean Stanton. Southern action drama film about cockfighting.

name: Bongwater
description: Bongwater is a movie starring Luke Wilson, Alicia Witt, and Amy Locane. An indolent artist in Portland, Oregon becomes addicted to marijuana, prompting his girlfriend to flee to New York City with a heroin addict.

name: Le chant du Styrène
description: Le chant du Styrène is a short starring Pierre Dux and Sacha Vierny. Poetic and aesthetic visit of a large polystyrene factory.

name: Waga seishun no Arcadia
description: Waga seishun no Arcadia is a movie starring Makio Inoue, Kei Tomiyama, and Yûjirô Ishihara. Space captain Harlock, the latest in a family of proud aerial warriors, begins his journey to free the oppressed Earth from the despotic...

name: Meetin' WA
description: Meetin' WA is a short starring Woody Allen, Jean-Luc Godard, and Annette Insdorf. Revolutionary French New Wave director Jean-Luc Godard conducts a twenty-five minute interview with influential and acclaimed American director Woody...

name: Deseret
description: Deseret is a movie starring Fred Gardner. Landscape shots of Utah with narration chronicling its history by way of The New York Times excerpts from the 1850s to the 1990s.

name: Red Hollywood
description: Red Hollywood is a video starring Paul Jarrico, Eric Johnston, and Ring Lardner Jr.. A documentary that examines the films made by the victims of the Hollywood Blacklist and offers a radically difference perspective on a key period...

name: Soigne ton gauche
description: Soigne ton gauche is a short starring Jacques Tati, Max Martel, and Louis Robur. A boxer is out in the country with his entourage, training for his next fight. Meanwhile, on the farm nearby, Roger is neglecting his chores. As he...

name: Nekromantik 2
description: Nekromantik 2 is a movie starring Monika M., Mark Reeder, and Simone Spörl. A female nurse desperately tries to hide her feelings of necrophilia from her new boyfriend, but still has pieces of the corpse of the first movie's hero in...

name: Zarkorr! The Invader
description: Zarkorr! The Invader is a movie starring Franklin A. Vallette, Don Yanan, and Peter Looney. An "average" postal worker is informed by a tiny alien hologram which looks like a teenage girl that he is the "choosen one" to destroy a...

name: 3 dev adam
description: 3 dev adam is a movie starring Aytekin Akkaya, Deniz Erkanat, and Yavuz Selekman. Istanbul is being terrorized by a crime wave, and the police call in American superhero Captain America and Mexican wrestler Santo to put a stop to it.

name: Troe iz Prostokvashino
description: Troe iz Prostokvashino is a short starring Oleg Tabakov, Valentina Talyzina, and Mariya Vinogradova. Little Fedor brings a cat to home despite his mother's distaste for cats. He runs away with his talking cat, to make more friends...

name: Poveri milionari
description: Poveri milionari is a movie starring Maurizio Arena, Renato Salvatori, and Lorella De Luca. Salvatore has an accident that makes him lose his memory and becomes director of the department store where his brother-in-law works.

name: Plasticni Isus
description: Plasticni Isus is a movie starring Vukica Djilas, Svetlana Gligorijevic, and Tomislav Gotovac. Tom is a young guy from Zagreb, completely without money, trying to make films in Belgrade. He somehow manages to survive with a help of...

name: Metzitzim
description: Metzitzim is a movie starring Arik Einstein, Uri Zohar, and Sima Eliyahu. Gote and Eli are two aging friends who don't want to age. Gote is a lifeguard who's fighting peepers on the Tel-Aviv beach. Eli is a guitar player who dreams...

name: Prata Palomares
description: Prata Palomares is a movie starring Renato Borghi, Carlos Gregório, and Renato Dobal. While waiting for directions, two revolutionaries hide in a church, where they meet a woman who wants to have a son with one of them.

name: Jiu shi liu liu de ta
description: Jiu shi liu liu de ta is a movie starring Kenny Bee, Anthony Chan, and Ping-Yu Chang. The daughter of a wealthy man takes French lessons so she can go to France with her fiancée, but ends up falling for a poor man who studies civil...

name: Requiem pour un vampire
description: Requiem pour un vampire is a movie starring Marie-Pierre Castel, Mireille Dargent, and Philippe Gasté. Two girls on the run get lost in the French countryside, and wind up in a haunted chateau occupied by an ailing vampire and his...

name: The Muthers
description: The Muthers is a movie starring Jeannie Bell, Rosanne Katon, and Trina Parks. A band of female pirates go undercover at a prison camp on a coffee plantation to rescue their leader's sister.

name: Hessed Mufla
description: Hessed Mufla is a movie starring Sharon Alexander, Aki Avni, and Dvora Bartonov. Against the backdrop of AIDS, the film explores two families, each with a gay son. Jonathan is splitting from Miki because the more experienced Miki is...

name: Leila
description: Leila is a movie starring Leila Hatami, Ali Mosaffa, and Jamileh Sheikhi. Leila and Reza meet in a kind of celebration and fall for each other. Having discovered their love, they get married soon only to find out the infertility of...

name: Vinni-Pukh
description: Vinni-Pukh is a short starring Evgeniy Leonov, Iya Savvina, and Vladimir Osenev. A Soviet version of Winnie-the-Pooh. His first adventure is a desperate attempt to get to honey in a bee hollow. He is ready to take decisive action.

name: The Other Side of the Wind
description: The Other Side of the Wind is a movie starring John Huston, Oja Kodar, and Peter Bogdanovich. A Hollywood director emerges from semi-exile with plans to complete work on an innovative motion picture.

name: Thrust in Me
description: Thrust in Me is a short starring Nick Zedd, Don Houston, and Magot Damian. A woman contemplates suicide in her NY apartment. Her boyfriend returns home to find her corpse in the bath and takes his sexual pleasure from it.

name: Venom
description: Venom is a movie starring Tom Hardy, Michelle Williams, and Riz Ahmed. A failed reporter is bonded to an alien entity, one of many symbiotes who have invaded Earth. But the being takes a liking to Earth and decides to protect it.

name: Aquaman
description: Aquaman is a movie starring Jason Momoa, Amber Heard, and Willem Dafoe. Arthur Curry, the human-born heir to the underwater kingdom of Atlantis, goes on a quest to prevent a war between the worlds of ocean and land.

name: Ready Player One
description: Ready Player One is a movie starring Tye Sheridan, Olivia Cooke, and Ben Mendelsohn. When the creator of a virtual reality called the OASIS dies, he makes a posthumous challenge to all OASIS users to find his Easter Egg, which will...

name: Le lit de la vierge
description: Le lit de la vierge is a movie starring Zouzou, Pierre Clémenti, and Tina Aumont. A loose Biblical allegory starring the legendary model-artist-musician Zouzou as Mary Magdalene, French actor Pierre Clémenti as Jesus and the...

name: Daguerreotypes
description: Daguerreotypes is a movie starring Lucien Bossy, Leance Debrossian, and Marcelle Debrossian. Portraits of the people that occupy the small shops of the Rue Daguerre, Paris, where the filmmaker lived.

name: Suraj Ka Satvan Ghoda
description: Suraj Ka Satvan Ghoda is a movie starring Rajit Kapoor, Raghuvir Yadav, and Siraj Ahmed. On a lazy afternoon, a man shares his memories of a storyteller friend who once narrated a convoluted love story with intertwined plots. As...

name: Mauri
description: Mauri is a movie starring Anzac Wallace, Eva Rickard, and James Heyward. Near the remote East Cape the matriarch lives in her very basic dwelling with real fire in the hearth, where she cooks. We get an insight in the whanau in this...

name: Ek Doctor Ki Maut
description: Ek Doctor Ki Maut is a movie starring Shabana Azmi, Pankaj Kapur, and Irrfan Khan. After years of painstaking research at the cost of his domestic pleasure, Dr. Dipankar Roy discovers a vaccine for leprosy. The news is flashed over...

name: Blonde Crazy
description: Blonde Crazy is a movie starring James Cagney, Joan Blondell, and Louis Calhern. The adventures of an egoistic con man and his glamorous accomplice.

name: Angst
description: Angst is a movie starring Erwin Leder, Robert Hunger-Bühler, and Silvia Ryder. A troubled man gets released from prison and starts taking out his sadistic fantasies on an unsuspecting family living in a secluded house.

name: U.F.O. Abduction
description: U.F.O. Abduction is a video starring Tommy Giavocchini, Patrick Kelley, and Shirly McCalla. On a typical fall evening in 1983, a young man was videotaping his niece's 5th birthday party. As the night's strange occurrences took...

name: Paskutine atostogu diena
description: Paskutine atostogu diena is a movie starring Lina Braknyte, Valeriy Zubarev, and Bronius Babkauskas. Movie about a friendship of two children - a girl and a boy during the last day of summer holiday

name: Ilektrikos angelos
description: Ilektrikos angelos is a movie starring Faidon Georgitsis, Marili Tsopanelli, and Filippos Sofianos. Pivoting around the eternal dipole of man/woman, masculinity/femininity, Thanasis Rentzis' typically experimental film delves deep...

name: Space Is the Place
description: Space Is the Place is a movie starring Barbara Deloney, Sun Ra, and Raymond Johnson. Sun Ra--space-age prophet, pharoanic jester, shaman-philosopher and avant-jazz keyboardist/bandleader--lands his spaceship in Oakland, having been...

name: No Time to Die
description: No Time to Die is a movie starring Ana de Armas, Ralph Fiennes, and Daniel Craig. James Bond has left active service. His peace is short-lived when Felix Leiter, an old friend from the CIA, turns up asking for help, leading Bond...

name: Sky Sharks
description: Sky Sharks is a movie starring Diana Prince, Naomi Grossman, and Cary-Hiroyuki Tagawa. "Deep in the ice of the antarctic, a team of geologists uncover an old nazi laboratory still intact where dark experiments had occured. In order...

name: Death on the Nile
description: Death on the Nile is a movie starring Gal Gadot, Kenneth Branagh, and Armie Hammer. While on vacation on the Nile, Hercule Poirot must investigate the murder of a young heiress.

name: The Flash
description: The Flash is a movie starring Ben Affleck, Michael Keaton, and Ezra Miller. The plot is unknown. Feature film based on the comic book superhero, The Flash.

name: The Batman
description: The Batman is a movie starring Robert Pattinson, Colin Farrell, and Andy Serkis. The plot is unknown.

name: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them 3
description: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them 3 is a movie starring Mads Mikkelsen, Jude Law, and Alison Sudol. The third installment of the 'Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them' series which follows the adventures of Newt Scamander.
